pages.text: https://www.artsbarandgrillsc.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/arts_reel_-_SKF_23__MOV_AdobeExpress.mp4 Situated in the heart of Mount Pleasant, South Carolina, Art’s Bar & Grill is a local favorite! Stop in for lunch or dinner and try some of our legendary Lowcountry cuisine, attend one of our famous oyster roasts, enjoy a LOCAL beer, and come and relax at our patio bar with the best staff in the business! LOCAL & FRESH Thanks readers of Mount Pleasant magazine for voting us Best Bar in Mount Pleasant! We are honored and look forward to continuing to serve you with awesome local food and genuine southern hospitality. 20 years and counting! Oyster Roasts! (in season) If you love oysters, Art's is THE place in town to go! Oyster Roasts are every weekend during the season. We only purchase Bull's Bay Clusters from LOCAL purveyors. Pricing is: $19.99 per bucket. Thank you for your … Read More Visit Us Art’s Bar & Grill 413 Coleman Blvd. Mt. Pleasant, SC 843-849-3040 OUR HOURS OPEN DAILY Monday – Thursday – 11 am – 11 pm Friday – 11 am – 12 am Brunch: 10 am – 3 pm Lunch & Dinner: 11 am – 10 pm Saturday – 10 am – 11 pm Brunch: 10 am – 3 pm Lunch & Dinner: 3 pm – 9 pm Sunday – 10 am – 10 pm Keep in Touch Want to keep up with the latest happenings from Art's?
